idea-plugin.name: JustIDEA
idea-plugin.description:
JustIDEA, one IDEA plugin ❤ for you ❤.
  • ===插件信息===
  • ===介绍===
  • this is a plugin demo
  • Author: LC ahlc@sina.cn
  • Github: http://github.com/ahviplc
  • Version: v1.0.0
  • ===功能===
  • 1.0: 随机字符串
  • 2.0: 看箴言
  • 3.0: fastgit : 将github项目链接转成fastgit快速访问版链接
  • 4.0: github1s : 将github项目链接转成github1s可编辑vscode版链接
  • ===使用===
  • Quick use: Ctrl + Alt + Shift + R | Command + Alt + Shift + R
by LC
